articles.author: Rebecca Bellan
articles.title: Claude Code is coming to Slack, and that’s a bigger deal than it sounds - TechCrunch
articles.description: Anthropic launches Claude Code in Slack, letting developers delegate coding tasks from chat threads. It's part of a shift toward AI-embedded collaboration that could reshape software workflows.
articles.content: Anthropic is launching Claude Code in Slack, allowing developers to delegate coding tasks directly from chat threads. The beta feature, available Monday as a research preview, builds on Anthropic’s e… [+2156 chars]
